item.title: Real AI Crisis Is Compute Shortage, Not Bubble, Says Daniel Newman: 'Those Calling For A Bubble Don't Understand What's Happening'
item.description: Daniel Newman dismisses AI bubble fears, citing a global compute shortage. Read why 2026 is the start of a multi-decade AI super-cycle. read more
